content:
path /v3/bnb/broadcast
operationId BnbBroadcast
summary Broadcast signed BNB transaction
description 5 credits per API call
Broadcast signed transaction to Binance blockchain This method is used internally or Tatum client libraries
It is possible to create custom signing mechanism and use this method only for broadcasting data to the blockchain
requestBody
Broadcast
properties
txData
description Raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxLength 500000
minLength 1
type string
signatureId
type string
minLength 24
maxLength 24
description Identifier of KMS pending transaction ID to be completed with the broadcast
required
txData
type object
required True
responses
200
TransactionHash
type object
txId
description The hash ID of the transaction
type string
required
txId
description OK
